house_listing.house_description: This 1 level single family home built in 1957 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car detached garage and approximately 1512 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Hardwood Flooring, Storage Space, Wet Bar, Workshop
